name: nativescript-slideshow-busy-indicator
description: A busy indicator plug-in for Nativescript.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run android --emulator
scripts.test.ios: cd ../demo && tns platform remove ios && tns test ios --emulator
scripts.test.ios.device: cd ../demo && tns platform remove ios && tns test ios
scripts.test.android: cd ../demo && tns platform remove android && tns test android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-slideshow-busy-indicator && tns plugin add ../src && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin add ../src && cd ..
